casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Odell FAIR 308P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Michael Odell Fair, for Fair, Michael Odell. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of September 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Motion to Intervene an Estoppel and Rebuttal to Quittance Claim:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
